snippet: Until the government assumes its proper role in redressing apartheid-era crimes, the I.C.C. must serve as an essential backstop.
lead_paragraph: Until the government assumes its proper role in redressing apartheid-era crimes, the I.C.C. must serve as an essential backstop.

headline.main: Helping to Deliver Justice to Kenyans
